Start with a brisk walk and gradually increase to a light jog for 20 minutes.
Run at a moderate pace for 25 minutes, aiming to cover a distance of 2 miles.
Run continuously for 30 minutes at a comfortable pace, aiming to cover a distance of 2.5 miles.
Increase your running duration to 35 minutes, aiming to cover a distance of 3 miles.
Run for 35 minutes at a steady pace, aiming to cover a distance of 4 miles.
Incorporate interval training: alternate between 5 minutes of moderate pace and 2 minutes of sprinting for a total of 40 minutes.
Run for 45 minutes at a steady pace, aiming to cover a distance of 5 miles.
Mix longer runs with shorter bursts of speed: run 30 minutes at a comfortable pace, then include 5 sets of 1-minute sprints with 1-minute recovery in between.
Begin with a 10-minute warm-up, then run for 50 minutes at a steady pace, aiming to cover a distance of 7 miles.
Incorporate hill repeats: warm up for 15 minutes, then perform 6 sets of hill sprints (1-2 minutes each) with jog recoveries in between, totaling 60 minutes.
Long-distance run: run for 60 minutes at a steady pace, aiming to cover a distance of 8 miles.
Mix tempo and speed: start with a 15-minute warm-up, then alternate between 10 minutes at a tempo pace and 5 minutes at a faster speed, repeating for a total of 75 minutes.
Warm up with 5 minutes of stretching. Then, climb stairs for 20 minutes at a moderate pace. Cool down with 5 minutes of light walking.
Increase the intensity. Warm up with 5 minutes of stretching. Then, climb stairs for 25 minutes at a moderate pace. Cool down with 5 minutes of light walking.
Focus on consistency. Warm up with 5 minutes of stretching. Then, climb stairs for 30 minutes at a moderate pace. Cool down with 5 minutes of light walking.
Challenge yourself. Warm up with 5 minutes of stretching. Then, climb stairs for 35 minutes at a moderate pace. Cool down with 5 minutes of light walking.
Warm up with 10 minutes of stretching. Then, climb stairs for 30 minutes at a moderate to fast pace. Cool down with 5 minutes of light walking.
Increase the intensity. Warm up with 10 minutes of stretching. Then, climb stairs for 35 minutes at a fast pace. Cool down with 5 minutes of light walking.
Focus on endurance. Warm up with 10 minutes of stretching. Then, climb stairs for 40 minutes at a fast pace. Cool down with 5 minutes of light walking.
Challenge yourself. Warm up with 10 minutes of stretching. Then, climb stairs for 45 minutes at a fast pace. Cool down with 5 minutes of light walking.
Warm up with 15 minutes of stretching. Then, climb stairs for 40 minutes at a fast pace. Cool down with 5 minutes of light walking.
Increase the intensity. Warm up with 15 minutes of stretching. Then, climb stairs for 45 minutes at a fast pace. Cool down with 5 minutes of light walking.
Focus on endurance. Warm up with 15 minutes of stretching. Then, climb stairs for 50 minutes at a fast pace. Cool down with 5 minutes of light walking.
Challenge yourself. Warm up with 15 minutes of stretching. Then, climb stairs for 60 minutes at a fast pace. Cool down with 5 minutes of light walking.
